Thank you Granis for porting the map :)

s1_startzone, ... , s13_startzone, s13_endzone

This is my the non-jail version (NJV) of the surf map surf_bnw, having the same "black and white" theme as it, or like my other map is_bnw. The abbreviation was required as there already is a map named surf_blackandwhite (it has nothing to do with it though). 

It's a single-run surf map with an extra bonus level in the middle of the circuit.

I hope yall like this map, it was a very old project that got abandoned and picked up almost 7 years later... still, it's one of the maps I dedicated my best efforts to finish!

Happy surfin'!

This is my complete map having the "black and white" theme as is_bnw. The abbreviation was required as there already is a map named surf_blackandwhite (it has nothing to do with it though). 

It's a single-run surf map with an extra bonus level in the middle of the circuit.
The bonus level and the main map can both take you to the ending room (supposing you are the one who finished the map first),  where you'll have four buttons standing next to you. Meanwhile, all the other people from the game that could not finish the map before you will be stuck into the wall, waiting for your decision. The buttons can:  
  1. Give you a M249 machine gun to kill them
  2. Set them on fire and watch them slowly die
  3. Take everyone to a map-themed ice-skating arena, where you'll be the one that will have a shotgun instead of having only knives (like everyone else)
  4. Take everyone (unarmed) to another ice-skating arena, but this one being the race kind. At the end of the circuit, there will be a door. Whoever finishes first and goes into this door can stay alive (whereas everyone else dies instantly)
I hope yall like this map, it was a very old project that got abandoned and picked up almost 7 years later... still, it's one of the maps I dedicated my best efforts to finish!
If anyone is interested in a NJV (non-jail version) of the map, please tell me via inbox or in the comment section! :) Happy surfin'!

I never took the time to port my first surf map on css but someone asked me so here it is

differences with surf_bluewall:
- css only, feel free to port it to csgo if you want (thank you "RedVenom" for wanting me to port this map)
- b1: linear version of the map (thank you "justjimtv" for proposing this idea)
- b2: random route on s4
- b3: random lost stage i've made (sorry)
- minor ramp fixes

Map: tier 2-3, 4 stages, 3 bonuses

Download link (css): https://gamebanana.com/maps/199191
(original map on csgo: https://gamebanana.com/maps/189354 ; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdRxJhRdZk0)

Showcase video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eTKTueaRbr4

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).

_sText:
surf_blue

Tier 2 - Linear

This map is my second one made using Hammer. Was planned out to be a somewhat smooth but technical surf roughly ~30-40 seconds long. Any feedback will be appreciated.

CSS: https://gamebanana.com/maps/198672
CSGO: https://gamebanana.com/maps/198673

Tier 7
Linear
3 Bonuses

Thanks to Spree, I began to experiment with making spinny styled stuff. When they made surf_strike b1, I got very interested in experimenting with super fast-paced type spins. This, along with me running surf_tronic, Spy Complex also making interesting spins, is how surf_blackheart was made.

The theme is almost entirely based off of the title, which is just a song by Carly Rae Jepsen. some other detailing aspects come from stuff like the flood from Halo and some other apocalyptic games/media.

note: the tier was decided by the testers, about 60-75% of the testers said it was tier 7 or tier 8, the rest said tier 6.
note2: displacement surf is allowed

server/zone configuration:

The map, b1 and b3 should have a dropzone start (meaning the zone hovers above the area you fall through, so you drop through it). b2 should be a regular zone being only above the start platform.

The trigger_multiple zones of the map are named:
mapstartzone
mapendzone
b1startzone
b1endzone
etc...

This is the official port of the CS:GO map found here: https://gamebanana.com/maps/206656

= Surf_Beverages by Sid =

Did you enjoy Surf_Fruits? What about Surf_Vegetables? No? Well that's great because now you can play on the latest and greatest consumables-related skill surf map, Surf_Beverages!

Each stage represents a different type of drink and gradually increases in difficulty. There are also 3 bonuses themed as alcoholic beverages.

- Tier 2 Staged, roughly 2 minutes long
- 3 bonus stages (T1, T4, T5)
- Designed for CSGO, ported to Source

You can find the CSGO version here:
https://www.sendspace.com/file/1rxm3g


Special thanks to Donkey for creating the third Bonus as well as test playing the map. Also thanks to Draph for test playing as well as creating this playthrough of the main map!

Tier 1/2 | 7 stages| 4 Bonuses

This is the 2nd beginner map with the same vibe from the first surf_beginner. As some have said, this is a new modern version of the first. Hopefully in a better way ;)

It has been tested with default velocity (and is made for such) with 150/300 airaccelerate.

Also a big thanks to granis for this amazing port!

Hope you enjoy!

This is my old map that my friends asked me to finish and finally release. There are 2 bonuses on the map that should was on surf_klue, but for some reason were removed at the last moment.

The textures of the ramps are made in the form of hexagonal grids that smoothly flow from purple to pink, and they also blend harmoniously with the rims that highlight the edges of the ramp.

The whole idea of the map is contained in the 3 stage. On it, you can see two co-ordinally different ways. One tier4 for the weak, the second for the experienced tier6+ . The time difference is significant.

As always, source can't work with model lighting :/

I hope you will positively evaluate this map and stay with pleasant emotions after playing it!

Dr. R Cade has kidnapped the famous arcade machines of history, distorting their levels for his own pleasure and gain. Enter his world and save the arcade machines from their cruel fate.

surf_arcade is my submission for the Fall 2020 KSF Mapping Contest. The map sees the player surf through a variety of retro arcade-style environments each with their own unique surfing style. The map is my take on the theme of "adventure" and is my fifth full-release project for surf. The map is tier 2 with plenty of skips as well as a bonus. A big thanks to the judges and the KSF owners for putting this contest together, as well as the KSF community for contributing to the generous prize pool. I hope you enjoy the map as much as i enjoyed making it :)

3500 maxvel, tier 2

Surf_Aquaflow
Linear
Tier 2
2 Checkpoints
sv_maxvelocity 3500
66 tick

Its an aquatic tier 2 map, starting in a dome, surfing around coral reefs and in glass tunnels, ending on a underwater drone thingy. it takes about 50 seconds of surf on average to beat the map.

The map has quite a few skips for faster surfers, its a more of a hard t2 but is still relatively forgiving (not unit surf for sure).

There will be a csgo port soon hopefully

Map originally made on csgo for 85t, backported to css.

T3-T4 Linear on 66t.

Few changes were made to backport, nothing major though.

This map was developed a long time ago (4-5 years) but never finished. Now I had the time and motivation to fix all the bugs I've noticed and give it a better look.
The theme was based on the catholic-related beliefs of what happens in the afterlife. I am no Catholic myself, but have known the main "afterlife" background since I was young, and then decided to make a visual representation of it.

The player will have three options to choose:
  • Heaven (most of the map is directed upwards, with boosts that push the player up)
  • Hell (classic surf, with lots of obstacles and one horizontal ramp in the end)
  • Purgatory (small but tedious and repetitive as it should be)
Purgatory's ending/jail is by far the coolest one, as it's set up in a maze with inumerous traps, that can be triggered (or not) by the player who finished the level first.

Surf_summit

Started by Juxtapo

Finished by Phurix

A fast paced linear surf map set in the Swiss Alpine region featuring mountain top lakes, winding caverns, and bottomless ravines. This map was orientated for both new and experienced players, Also includes one bunnyhop bonus and two medium difficulty surf bonuses created by Syncronyze and Phurix.

Extra special thanks to Nyro for inspiring a large portion of the map.

This map was a one week project I started in 2015, I finished up the 2 staged map to around 75% then didn't work on it for four full years. Here it is completed with 2 added bonuses. Enjoy

TIER 4 AND NO LESS THAN 4 EVER

Special thanks to Bro for porting the map.

Surf_Vindictive by -[Element]-
This is my first surf map, I tried to keep architecture as realistic as possible, also I tried to keep gameplay as fun as possible with the experience I have (Not to much ;p). So here goes nothing... Vindictive is a combat surf map of average size. Vindictive features 2 spawns each allowing 2 directions to surf in. This setup creates a symetrical style of gameplay. Vindictive's surf flows towards the middle, however it is not the only direction possible. The map can be played with normal surf and shooting, however those who wish to take it a step further can perform various telehops throughout the map. Telehops will allow you to get to spots on the map otherwise not availble by normal surf. Since vindictive has symetrical gameplay, there are 2 jails. This jail system is unique because you are randomly placed inside a jail instead of the same one. This jail system helps control jail campers and it gives you a chance to survive after falling. The jail doors release every 15 seconds to keep gameplay going. There is one secret in the map. This secret does NOT give a huge advantage because...well...that would be boring. The secret room needs to be activated throughout the map, and once it is activated, special prizes await. Good luck searching. :D ALL surf ramps are surfable in both directions, also there are various boosts throughout the map to help gain speed, be creative, surf anywhich way you feel comfortable, and most of all. Kill the other team. There are various weapons throughout the map and you keep these weapons if survive the round. All weapon spawners come with 2 rounds, but normal weapons come with 1 round. There is a different gun for everyones taste, don't worry. Have fun surfing! -------- Also, special thanks to.. Buck Nasty | Tons of help / ideas / server for beta test (surf.bucknastysurf.net:30000) Donald | Tons of ideas / server for beta test (No longer up D: ) Cornibulus | Lots of help / ideas AcidTongue | Help in the early stages Solidsurf.info | Great community / tons of help And All the beta testers and a more detailed list can be found in the "secret room" :D
Just a quick look at the map, and how I surf it, there are many ways it can be surfed.

SURF_QUOTA BY DROOL01 (SPYDR)

surf_quota is a short, simple surf map with emphasis on simplicity.
it can be used as a combat surf map too.

if you want to have a proper, clean round of combat surf, follow these rules:

1. Don't kill until you or the enemy is out of the spawn point

2. save weapons for later.

3. no hacking!

4. Have Fun!

I bring you surf_pyramidfort_beta, the first in a series of combat maps whose main goal is to entice the player (you) to stray away from the dull and boring "skill" surf.

This map was inspired by mashing surf_pyramidduel and surf_blockfort into one. Thus, surf_pyramidfort_beta.

Those who have played both will find that it replicates the feel of said levels. The gun placement from surf_blockfort has been kept and slightly remodeled to flow with the design of surf_pyramidduel.

------------------------------------------------------- 

Gameplay: Turn on that dusty, never-used server reserved for combat, load up the level, and play it with lots of people if you want to test the gameplay.

Hello folks, this is my first public release.  An arena style combat surf map with a unique jail-trap/release system.  Spawns are located on opposite sides of the map.  Each spawn features a week boost that may be hit with a telehop found in the middle of the map, if hit properly you may find yourself with a ton of speed and air thrusting towards the arena area.  

At the initial choke-point you will find an AK-47, M4A1, or M3.  Below the initial choke-point is a teleport to the top & a Scout + Deagles lined up on a bench + a teleport to the top.

There are four sniping pads at the very top with AWPs & 'wedge' boosters that you may use to fly across to the next pad.

There's a secret room that you must fly central high to reach.  The teleport to it is not visible, so don't expect to find it right away :-)

If there's any suggestions for feedback or improvements please get in touch with me and I will do what I can to improve the map.  Everybody's input is highly appreciated, and hopefully somebody can enjoy this map as much as I do.

**VERSION 2 CHANGES:**
1. Added additional boosts & wedge boosters for improved flow, also makes it easier to surf
2. Removed timed door from tube
3. Fixed cubemaps
4. Misc. minor details

Small combat surf map.
Available weapons: glock, usp, elites, deagle, m3 super shotgun, mp5 navy, ump45, m4a1, ak47, scout, awp, para, he grenade.
DEV textures, skybox: flowsky15.
Jail session can be avoided by bunnyhopping out of it with the jump but beware for the electric shocks!

Somewhere in the void, machinery hums and whirs for all of eternity.

You wanted a combat map? YOU GOT ONE! So, my map turnover seems to be between half a year and a year. Can you remember my last map? Surf_Machinery is another flowy combat map; if you are good enough you should be able to surf around constantly.

Some Features:
- Jail
- Healing Zone in the middle, should direct the action
- 2 secrets you do want to find...
- 1 secret you don't want to find!

Have fun with this one everyone, I hope you enjoy. For extra enjoyment, here is a small quiz.

1.  What map gave me the inspiration for this map?

That's it! Have a video!

<iframe width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8XrWk25KC68?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

This is the second version of an older map of mine entitled surf_library. 

It has many secrets in it for the player to find. Most of them include getting special weapons, like the previous version. There is also a teleport to a hidden buy zone, a place to choose any weapon of your choice.

The main difference of this map for the previous one (hence the 2 after its name) is because of the extra room I added right below the wall clock. Now it shows a broken wall, and beyond it there's a corridor with a single ramp that can boost the player through a deadly challenge. 
When beaten, the end of this corridor might lead to some cool features! :)

For more information, please refer to the older version of the map, in the link mentioned above :) Also watch the video, because many of the secrets weren't changed!

Happy surfing!

(04/05/2019 -> DESCRIPTION UPDATED)
(02/18/2012 -> MAP UPDATED AND FIXED)

This map took months to get done... it was not hard to make at all, it's just the ideas that took a long time to show up. It's themed as a library, with wooden surf ramps and bookshelves inside a big room. 

There are plenty of secrets of how to get weapons and grenades. There's also one that takes you to an empty white room, with nothing but a lever... that kills everyone in the map (but you) when pulled. Plus, there are also 4 buttons in a bookshelf (the nearest to the clock) which can give you either AK-47, M4A1, SG552 or AUG. 

NOTE: It has a Bomb Zone too, in its very center. 
(for Terrorists to blow the shit up)

The following video shows all the secrets of the map and some free-styling. Enjoy!
Video

It's a combat surf with <font color="red">Shotguns(m3)</font>, <font color="red">MP5s</font>, <font color="red">Scouts</font> and <font color="red">AWPs</font>.
